item.description:
Let's walk around the inside of Fenway on Sunday afternoon! I managed to get 8 bleacher seats for this Sunday's 1:35pm game and decided to make them available here. They are Upper Bleacher seats, section 38, row 31.

The cost of each ticket is $15 ($12 plus all the fees they added on when I bought them). I'll take cash payment when we meet up and I hand out the tickets. Online incurs too many fees and can be a hassle and these are real tickets not eTickets, so I can't send them via email. The cheapest tickets in this section on StubHub are going for $45 right now, so this is quite a deal!

Please be on time. I want to be inside Fenway Park before the game starts at 1:35pm. Expect getting to Fenway to take longer than usual because of the crowds. Parking is expensive, so I stronly suggest taking the T. If you are going to be late, you must call me to let me know.

The current weather forecast is 77F with a 40% chance of scattered thunderstorms. Check the weather before you come so you know whether to bring an umbrella or sunscreen.

I have set this meetup to a Manual Waiting List, which means when a spot opens up, all members on the waiting list will be emailed, and it's a race to change your RSVP. The spot will also be open to anyone who visits the website and is not on the Waiting List.

===========================================
Because this involves real tickets that can only be used for this game, please
only signup if you seriously intend on coming. There are no Maybe's, and
Yes's mean Yes. Please don't leave me trying to sell the tickets at the last
minute because you changed your mind or decided not to come. If you signup
and can't make it, please change your RSVP as soon as possible so someone
else can take your spot. Thanks.
==================================================

Also, I will probably go to check out my garden after the game if the weather is good, so you can come too if you want. It's a block away at the Fenway Victory Gardens.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside Gate C. See my profile pic & put a Sox hat on top. I'll email RSVPs with my cell # too.
item.name: Red Sox game vs. KC
